This really great girl named Crystal. She made moves on me in elementary and I still thought girls were gross because you know, kids. Then we lost contact in high school but I never forgot about her. Then when I was 20 or so I spoke to a mutual friend of ours and found out she was back in the area. We met up to hang not too weeks later. She was still very beautiful and after a few dates we started being partners, but not boyfriend/girlfriend... which for some reason bothered me. So after a year of hookups with her, i moved on. I've been married and have had a relationship after my marriage but I won't forget her ever...
She's married now and I'm single. I wish I could have another chance with her but it doesn't look likely. She truly will be my one who got away.
